text: Siberian languages may refer to any languages spoken in Siberia, including: *the Eskimoâ€“Aleut languages spoken in northeastern Siberia *the Mongolic languages spoken in Siberia *the Paleosiberian languages, several linguistic isolates and small families *the Russian dialects spoken in Siberia *the Siberian Turkic languages *the Tungusic languages spoken in northern and eastern Siberia *the Uralic languages spoken in northwestern Siberia *the Yeniseian languages spoken in central Siberia *German language spoken in Omsk oblast *
title: Siberian languages
